      void pickCard(int playerId, int aantal)
      method for taking a number of cards if you had uno, uno gets revoked when only need to take one: you are allowed to place again if you are able to place the card when you need to take more than one card, your turn gets skipped (for +2 and +4 cards)

                         int cardId)
